about_the_game:
This purchase also unlocks characters and scenes inside SinVR 2: Forbidden World

Leave your Carnal Fear behind, on this Night of the Giving Head!

Dangerous Flings
Featuring a growing roster of spooky-themed parody characters, you’ll see familiar faces,
but they may be sexier than you remember…

Dark Funtasies
Each immortally lust-filled scenario has a quick 'visual novel' story to set the scene,
before you join in the fun!

Wet Nightmares
These scarily immersive environments are perfect for the things that go hump in the night!
From steamy intimate scenes to multi-girl romps, expect to explore elements of the taboo…

Fear Amor
Choose your female companions and join them on a journey to the dark side.
Be prepared to Gore 'n Score!

Thrilling Features:
  • An interactive PC experience unlike any other!
  • 5 stories in visual novel format and interactive sex
  • Custom combinations of sexual partners
  • Supports No-VR mode, with only a PC & mouse (no VR headset)
  • VR support for Vive and Rift headsets
  • Additional girls and scenes will be available via DLC

This is no Hack-n-slash... this is HACK 'N FLASH!

Bonus:
  • All characters and scenes are also unlocked for free inside SinVR 2: Forbidden World!
  • 'Mix and Match' to your heart's content!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features nudity, adult language, consensual sex and playful spanking.  All the characters in the game are 18 years old and over.  Some scenes depict violence and/or gore.

name: Fright Night Sex Fest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or AMD R9 390 equivalent or greater

short_description: This is no Hack-n-slash... this is HACK 'N FLASH! Dark and stormy nights are filled with cock-starved, horny frights. Leave your Carnal Fear behind, on this Night of the Giving Head!
